edu.xtec.util

Interface Domable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionReg, ActiveBagContent, ActiveBoxContent, Activity, ActivityBag, ActivityReg, ActivitySequence, ActivitySequenceElement, ActivitySequenceJump, Arith, Author, AutoContentProvider, BasicEvaluator, BoxBase, ClassicJigSaw, Complete, ComplexAssociation, ComplexEvaluator, ConditionalJumpInfo, CrossWord, DomableBean, DoublePuzzle, Evaluator, EventSounds, EventSoundsElement, ExchangePuzzle, Explore, FillInBlanks, Gradient, GroupData, HolePuzzle, Holes, Identify, Identify, InformationScreen, JClicProject, JigSaw, JumpInfo, LibraryManager, LibraryManagerElement, MediaBag, MediaBagElement, MediaContent, MemoryGame, Menu, MenuElement, Operator, Order, Organization, PlayerSettings, ProjectInstaller, ProjectLibrary, ProjectSettings, Rectangular, Revision, Shaper, SimpleAssociation, TagReplace, TCPReportBean, TextActivityBase, TextGridContent, TriangularJigSaw, UserData, WordSearch, WrittenAnswer

    public interface Domable
    This interface applies to all classes that can serialize and de-serialize its data into a XML Element of type JDOM. The getJDomElement method stores the current non-transient data into a JDOM element, and setProperties reads the data. Domable classes should implement also a static method that builds new objects from a provided Element.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
